text: William Ashe Dymoke Windham (2 April 1926 â€“ 5 January 2021) was a British rower. He competed for Great Britain in the 1952 Summer Olympics. He was born in Biggleswade, Bedfordshire. He died on 5 January 2021 at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Great Britain Category:British rowers Category:Sportspeople from Bedfordshire
title: William Windham (rower)
